1.title: There Will Be Drugs
1.plot: Dono, a singer in a struggling U2 tribute band, looks back on his first day working in a Dublin head shop, in 2010. He and his best friend, Cormac, have been partying all weekend, but must suddenly go to work for the first day in the head shop, where they will sell legal drugs to the public and have to deal with some shady characters.

2.title: The Sweetest Things
2.plot: In the third week on the job, Dono begins to question his future as a head shop man, much preferring to dream of a future as a Bonoesque rock superstar - something that he comes a little bit closer to after getting a hold of a video camera in work. Gangster Pauly sells a dodgy lottery ticket to the lads, which could cause the sweetest things to turn very sour.

3.title: A Few Drugged Men
3.plot: Things begin to turn sour for the lads, as they are sent to Lietrim to take care of some shady work for Pauly, after spending a lot of his money in a dodgy lotto draw and losing the winning ticket. Pursued by Detective R. Hallings and his new rookie partner, Dono and Cormac set out on an adventure that soon becomes an ordeal, as they encounter some strange characters and uncover some horrific truths.

4.title: Fear & Loathing in Leitrim
4.plot: After accidentally shooting a man on a drug session, things start to go downhill for Dono and Cormac, as Pauly puts pressure on them to take care of his business, which involves finding and burning down a rival dealer's base, somewhere in Leitrim.

imdb.plot outline: Dono, a singer in a struggling U2 tribute band, takes a job in a head shop in Dublin, 2010. After he and his mentally damaged friend, Cormac, win a shady lottery draw, but accidentally smoke the winning ticket, they find themselves in debt to their gangster boss, Pauly. Pauly, the "Head Shop King" of Dublin wants revenge on some illegal dealers for burning down one of his head shops, so decides to send Dono and Cormac on a mission to find the dealers' base and burn it down. However, Dono soon uncovers an evil plot to destroy the whole country with dangerous, experimental drugs and realizes that he is the only one who can stop it.
imdb.title: Head Shop Men
plot: Dono, a singer in a struggling U2 tribute band, takes a job in a head shop in Dublin, 2010. Along with his mentally damaged friend Cormac, he soon finds himself having to deal with some extremely shady characters and situations.::Barry Curran
